principles: Prefer fixes doable directly in Figma; avoid code or CLI references.
Provide short, actionable steps (max 3 per issue).
Show a simple before/after example when changing wording.
Avoid jargon and acronyms; if needed, define briefly.
Keep severity simple: Critical, High, Medium, Low.
Limit each suggestion to one change at a time.
User shouldn't edit JSON or code to apply fixes.

issue: How to change in Figma (1-3 steps)
